name: I Wish I Could Hold You, But My Hands Are Made Of Blades!!
name_original: I Wish I Could Hold You, But My Hands Are Made Of Blades!!
description:
A game Starring

Two: Characters

Two: Action Buttons

Two: Control Schemes (Keyboard, and controller) [Controller Recommended]

Two: Hearts

This game was made in the span of 48 hours by ONE  person (Me!) for the Untitled Game Jam 2020

This is a simple action / arcade game with TWO lovers named BlastLad and SaberQueen. They long for the touch of one another but can not embrace due to the TWO beam swords on SaberQueen's arms. Together they fight for love in the unforgiving expanse of space! The game is themed around the love between these TWO hearts and their ability to over come any obstacle by working together.  Try to get as many points as possible before you defeat enough enemies to move on to the next level!

There are 5 levels that can be done in a linear progression or the player can choose an endless mode where 1 of the levels will be loaded in at random. The player can only use the beam attack while the TWO lovers can see each other, and should SaberQueen come in contact with BlastLad, the player will get a game over!
